explanation: [0-0] On a white plate, red and black jelly beans are arranged alternately in a heart shape. The background is a gray countertop.

[0-7] A white container appears on the right side, and the water in the container begins to slowly pour into the plate. A man wearing a dark blue shirt appears at the bottom of the screen, staring intently at the plate. The jelly beans begin to melt slowly, forming black and red stripes, gradually spreading towards the center and filling the entire heart shape. The man's expression changes from concentration to surprise, his eyes widen, his mouth opens, and he covers his mouth with his right hand, unable to conceal his astonishment.
